309129.「ふふ……あなたと こうして\n ゆっくり 過ごすことができて\n とても うれ:
Hmm hmm... It makes me so happy to be able to
spend time with you like this.

309130.「時間があるときに 話してあげたかったの。\n あなたの 生まれたときのこと……:
When the opportunity arose, I wanted to tell
you about your birth...

309131.「あの日は 私たち夫婦にとって\n 人生で 最良の日になった……。:
That day turned out to be the greatest day of
our lives...

309132.「よく 頑張ってくれたな マローネ！\n これが 俺たちの子か……。:
You did splendidly, Marone!
So this is our child...

309133.「さあ あなた。\n この子を 抱いてあげてください。: Come now, dear. Please hold your child.

309135.「まだ 首がすわっていないから\n しっかりと 支えてあげてくださいね。:
<if_woman>Her<else>His<endif> neck is still soft, so be sure
to support it well.

309137.「あの人ったら ちいさい あなたを\n 抱っこするのに ずっと\n おどおどしっ:
He always got so frightened whenever he had
to hold you...

309138.「おかしいでしょう？ エテーネ王国でも\n 指折りの剣士であるあの人が 生まれた:
Isn't it funny? That the greatest swordsman in
the Ethene Kingdom would be weak to a newborn
child?

309139.「でもね。\n そんなあの人の顔を見て\n あなたは……笑ってくれたのよ。:
But, you know... You would look at his face,
and you would smile.

309140.「ハハッ 見てくれ マローネ！\n 俺を見て 笑ったぞ！\n 俺のことが わかる:
Haha! Look, Marone! <if_woman>She<else>He<endif> looked at me
and smiled! <if_woman>She<else>He<endif> understands!

309141.「……ああ そうだ。<pc>。\n 俺が お前の父親だ。:
Yes, that's right, <pc>...
I'm your father.

309142.「ずっと お前に会いたかった。\n 生まれてきてくれて……\n 俺たちの子になっ:
I've waited so long to finally meet you.
For your being born...and for being ours...
Thank you.

309143.「あなたは そこにいるだけで 私たちに\n たくさんの幸せを 与えてくれたの。\:
Just by being there, you gave the both of us
so much happiness. Of course, even now...
You still do.

309144.「私たちは あなたのお父さんと\n お母さんになれて とても幸せ。\n だから:
We are so happy to call ourselves your mother
and father. So, I'd like to say these words
one more time.

309145.「私たちのもとに 生まれてきてくれて\n ありがとう <pc>。\n あなたのこ:
Thank you for coming into our lives,
<pc>.
I love you with all my being.

309146.「ふたりとも ここにいたのか。\n なんの話を していたんだ？:
Oh, you're both here. What were you talking
about just now?

309148.「また こうして 親子３人で過ごす日が\n 来るなど 思いもしなかったな。お前た:
To think the day would come where the three
of us could spend time together once more...
I thought I'd never see you again.

309149.「キュロノスを倒すため 必要なことだと\n 覚悟してはいたが お前たちとの別れは:
I was prepared to do what was necessary to
defeat Kyuronos, but the pain of saying
goodbye was unbearable...

309150.「もう二度と お前たちを\n この幸せな時を 失いたくはない……。:
In such happy times, I don't want to lose the
two of you again...

309151.「どこにもいきません……私も <pc>も。\n ずっと あなたのそばにいます。\:
I'm not going anywhere...and neither is
<pc>. We will always be with you.
We're your family.

309152.「ああ そうだな……。\n ありがとう マローネ。:
Yes, you're right...
Thank you, Marone.

309153.「そうだわ。\n あなたの話を 聞かせてちょうだい。\n あなたの長い長い 旅の:
Right, then. I'd like you to tell us your
story. Tell us about your long and
arduous journey...

309154.<pc>は マローネとパドレに\nこれまでの長い長い旅路の話を\n語って 聞かせ:
<pc> recounts to both Padre and
Marone the events of their long,
long journey so far...

309155.ふたりは ほほえみながら\n<pc>の話に 耳を傾け\n親子の時間は 過ぎていっ:
The two listened to <pc>'s stories
with smiles on their faces, and the time
between parents and child passed by...

309157.こうして エテーネ王国の \nお披露目式が 始まった。:
And thus began the unveiling ceremony of
the Ethene Kingdom.

309158.メレアーデは 国の代表として\n各国からの賓客を 立派にもてなし……:
As the country's representative, Mereade
entertained many a guest from all over the
world in fine fashion...

309159.客人たちは ５０００年の時を超えて 現れた\nアストルティアの 新たな仲間……\:
The visitors who had appeared and transcended 5000 years to become new companions of Astoltia... The Ethene Kingdom's arrival was
welcomed with much heartful joy and enthusiasm.

309160.式典は とどこおりなく 進行し\nメレアーデの演説によって\n締めくくられようと:
The ceremony proceeded without incident,
and was about to conclude with a speech
from Mereade...

309161.「各国より お越しの皆さま。私たちの暮らす\n エテーネ王国を アストルティアの:
My dear guests from every corner of the
world... Thank you so much for welcoming
the Ethene Kingdom as a new part of Astoltia.

309162.「私たちが 共に手を取り合い 歩む未来が\n 輝かしいもので ありますように！\:
May our future be bathed in glory as we walk
forward hand in hand! Glory to our homeland
of Astoltia!

309164.「どうだった？ ちゃんとできてたかしら？\n 私 緊張しちゃって……:
What did you think? Did I do all right?
I was so nervous...

309165.「どうしたの？\n 何か 探してるみたいだけど……。:
What's the matter?
You look like you've lost something...

309168.「何を言ってるんだ。お前の母親は\n マローネなんて名前じゃないし お前を産んで:
What are you talking about? Your mother's name
wasn't Marone...and she died shortly after
giving birth to you.

309169.「ねぇ 顔色が悪いわ。だいじょうぶ……？:
Hey, you don't look so good...
Are you sure you're okay...?

309170.「メレアーデ様 パドレ様\n 少々 よろしいでしょうか？:
Miss Mereade, Sir Padre... May I have a
moment?

309172.「慌ただしくて ごめんなさい <pc>。\n ちゃんと お礼も言いたいし\n あ:
Sorry to rush off, <pc>. Please come
to my office later so I can thank you
properly.

309173.「……ほう。\n そなたは 気づいたようだな。: I see... It appears you noticed it, too.

309174.「今 そなたの目の前で\n 起こったことは 夢まぼろしではない。\n すべて 現:
What you just witnessed was no dream.
It is all very real.

309175.「そなたの母の存在は この世からも\n 人々の記憶からも 跡形もなく 消え失せた:
Your mother's existence has vanished without
a trace from both this world and from people's
memories.

309176.「この場にいた 他の者は\n 誰も 気づいてすらおらん。\n 認識できたのは そ:
No one else here has any idea what happened.
Only you and I are aware.

309177.「これは 前ぶれにすぎぬ。\n いずれは アストルティアのすべてが……:
This is but a prelude. Eventually, all of
Astoltia...

309179.「まったく 要領を得ぬ……といった顔だな。\n まぁ 今は わからずともよい。:
You're completely clueless as to what's going
on, aren't you? Well...you don't need to know
that right now.

309180.「母を救いたければ 先の戦いで\n ジア・クト念晶体が 残していった\n 遺物を:
If you wish to save your mother, then you must
investigate the artifact left behind by the
Dia Kut Telecrystal in your last battle.

309181.「この磁光石が カギとなるだろう。\n 持っていくがよい。:
This Magnetolite stone is the key.
Take it with you.

309183.「……オーガの王が そなたを導くだろう。\n 未知の大地に すべての答えがある。:
The Ogre king will guide your way. In the
unknown land lies the answer to everything.
Now go...for the sake of Astoltia.

309185.「……そなたの働き 期待しているぞ。\n <pc>。:
...I'm counting on you to do your part,
<pc>.

309186.謎の少女は 姿を消してしまった……。\nひとまず 軍団長室にいる\nメレアーデの:
The mysterious girl disappears...
For now, head to the commander's office to
meet with Mereade.

309188.「ご足労いただき 申し訳ありません。\n この調査には あなたの協力が\n 不可:
I apologize for making you come out all this
way. However, I feel your cooperation is
essential to this investigation.

309189.「……おや？ どうして\n 私が オーグリード大陸にいるのか\n 不思議に 思わ:
...what's that? You're wondering why I'm in
Ogreed?

309190.「バドリー岩石地帯に現れた 塔と同じく\n ジア・クト念晶体が 残したとされる\:
Like that tower that appeared in the Budley
Rock Zone, this relic is believed to have
been left behind by Dia Kut...

309191.「もともと ガートラント王国だけで\n 調査をおこなっていたそうなのですが\n:
Originally it was Gartlant alone that was
going to conduct a survey here, but a lack
of experts proved difficult...

309192.「そこで アストルティアで\n 最先端の技術力を有する ドルワーム研究院の\n:
So that is why I, head of the the most technologically advanced institute in all of Astoltiaーthe Dolworm Research Instituteー
was invited to be a part of this project.

309193.「これは ジア・クト念晶体が使用していた\n なんらかの装置だと 推測されますが:
We assume that this is some kind of device
that Dia Kut used, but we don't know exactly
what it is or what it does...

309194.「彼らは 我々をはるかに 超越する\n 技術力を持った 生命体だったようですね。:
It seems they were lifeforms with a far
superior level of technology compared to
ours.

309195.「いろいろと 試してみてはいるのですが\n 肝心の動力源が 切れているようで\n:
We've tried everything we could, but it
appears the main power source has been
cut off, so the device won't even start.

309196.「ジア・クト念晶体と戦った あなたであれば\n この装置が何か 見当がつくのでは:
I called you here since I thought you might
have an idea what this device could be,
since you fought Dia Kut and all...

309197.「おっと。ここで 私が\n 長々と説明しても しかたがありませんね。\n さあ:
Well, there's no point in me standing here
and explaining it to you... Now then,
please go and take a closer look.

309199.磁光石を 装置のくぼみに はめてみますか？<yesno><close>:
Insert the Magnetolite into the hollow of
the device?<yesno><close>

309200.「石に 装置が反応している……？\n それを 装置のくぼみに\n はめてみてくれ:
Is the device reacting to that stone...?
Do you think you could try inserting
it into the device?

309201.<pc>は 装置のくぼみに\n謎の少女からもらった 磁光石を\nはめてみた！:
<pc> places the Magnetolite given to
them by the mysterious girl into the
hollow of the device!

309203.「ふむ……今ある情報だけでは\n ここが アストルティアのどこか\n 特定するの:
Hmmm...it seems difficult to discern where
in Astoltia we are with the information
currently available.

309204.「他に 何か\n 手がかりに なりそうなものが\n 見つかればいいのですが……。:
If only we could find something that could
help us...

309208.「今の魔物……私の記憶が 正しければ\n アストルティアで 確認されていないもの:
That monster just now... If I'm remembering
correctly, it hasn't been confirmed to appear
in Astoltia. Perhaps a new species...?

309209.「……え！？\n この星の配列は……まさか あり得ない！:
...What?! This star arrangement....
No way...this can't be...!

309210.「いや でも しかし……。\n ひょっとすると さっきの魔物も？\n すごいぞ:
No, but, well...that monster, could it
be...? Amazing! I can't believe it!!

309211.「<pc>さん。\n お 落ちついて 聞いてくださいね。:
<pc>.
P-please stay calm and listen to me.

309212.「先ほど 我々の前に現れた魔物は\n アストルティアで 確認されていないものです:
That monster we just saw has not been confirmed to exist in Astoltia. At first I thought it was just the advent of a new
species.

309213.「ですが ここの天体を視認したところ\n 我々の知る それとは 似ても似つかない:
However, upon observing the celestial bodies here, I saw that they exhibit patterns that are unlike anything currently known and
are astronomically improbable.

309214.「自分で言っていても 信じがたい話ですが\n これらの事象から 導き出される答え:
It's hard to believe, even saying it myself...
But there is only one explanation to be drawn
from these phenomena...

309215.「私たちは アストルティアではない\n 未知の世界に 来てしまったのですッッ！:
We've arrived in an unknown world! This is
not Astoltia!

309216.「……コホン。ともかく これは\n 歴史に残る 重大な発見と言えるでしょう。\n:
*ahem*... This is a significant discovery that will surely make it into the history books. I'd love to start investigating right away,
but...

309217.「先ほど 現れたものの他にも\n 危険な魔物が 生息している可能性は\n 否定で:
We cannot deny the possibility that there are
more dangerous monsters in addition to the
one we just witnessed.

309218.「いったん アストルティアに戻って\n ガートラント城にいらっしゃる グロスナー:
I will return to Astoltia and report this to
King Grossner.

309219.「調べたところ この装置は 遺跡にあったものと\n 対になっていて 問題なく使用:
After examining the device, I concluded that it seems to be a pair with the one found in those ruins. It should still work, so let's
use it to return to Astoltia.

309220.「では あの装置は ジア・クト念晶体が\n 使用していた 転送装置で\n 未知な:
So you're saying that device is a transporter
used by Dia Kut, and that it is connected
to an unknown world?

309221.「だとすると その世界は ジア・クト念晶体が\n 支配する 危険な地では あるま:
If that's the case...then that world must be
a dangerous place ruled by Dia Kut. You
confirmed the presence of their crystals, yes?

309222.「おそれながら もし そうであれば\n 周囲に ジア・クト念晶体の\n 拠点なり:
Fear not. If that were the case, it'd only be
natural that a Dia Kut stronghold would be
in the immediate vicinity.

309223.「かの地を ジア・クト念晶体が\n 支配する領土だと断ずるのは 早計に思います。:
It's too soon to declare that Dia Kut controls
this new land. We should explore it to be
absolutely sure.

309224.「生態系や天体だけではない……\n あの地には アストルティアに存在しない\n:
Not only are there ecosystems and celestial bodies...but many other possibilities lie dormant in that place that just do not exist
here in Astoltia.

309225.「ただちに 大規模な調査隊を結成し\n 未知の大地の 調査に向かうべきだと\n:
I believe that a large-scale exploration
team should form immediately to investigate
this unknown land!

309226.「あの世界の存在は 必ずや\n アストルティアの発展において\n 有益なものとな:
That world's existence will no doubt be
beneficial to Astoltia's development!
That's because...

309228.「そなたの考えも 理解できる。\n しかし ジア・クトのことを抜きにしても\n:
I understand your train of thought. But even
without Dia Kut's presence, we still don't
know of the dangers that await us.

309229.「ガートラントの王として 我が国の兵の命を\n いたずらに 危険にさらすわけには:
As Gartlant's king, I cannot allow the lives
of my soldiers to be needlessly endangered.
And of course, yours as well.

309231.「ふむ……。\n そなたはどう思う <pc>。\n 未知の大地へ 向かうべきだと:
Hmm... What do you think, <pc>?
Do you think we should go to this
unknown land?

309232.「母を救いたければ 先の戦いで\n ジア・クト念晶体が 残していった\n 遺物を:
If you wish to save your mother, then you must
investigate the artifact left behind by the
Dia Kut Telecrystal in your last battle.

309233.「……オーガの王が そなたを導くだろう。\n 未知の大地に すべての答えがある。:
The Ogre king will guide your way. In the
unknown land lies the answer to everything.
Now go...for the sake of Astoltia.

309234.「どうした？\n 何か 言いたいことがあるのか？<yesno><close>:
What's wrong? Is there something you'd like
to say?<yesno><close>

309235.「遠慮はするな。\n そなたの 本心を聞かせてほしい。\n 何か 言いたいことが:
No need to be shy. I want to know your true
feelings regarding this matter. Is there
something you'd like to say?<yesno><close>

309236.「大切な者を救うため 自分は 未知の大地へ\n 旅立たなければならない……そう:
You're saying...in order to save your loved one, then you must travel to this unknown land? That seems to imply some deeper
meaning.

309237.「わかった！ これまで アストルティアのため\n 尽くしてくれた そなたの望みを:
Very well! You have done so much for Astoltia,
so I cannot ignore your wishes. You have
my full cooperation!

309238.「ただちに ドルワーム王国と協力して\n アストルティア中から 有志を募り\n:
I will cooperate with the Dolworm Kingdom at
once to recruit volunteers from across
Astoltia and form an exploration team.

309239.「そして <pc>を その調査隊の隊長。\n ドゥラ院長を 特別技術顧問に\n:
Also, I appoint <pc> as captain of
this team, and Dura as special technical
advisor. Do you accept?

309240.「ありがとうございます グロスナー王！\n 急ぎ ドルワームに戻り ウラード国王:
Thank you, King Grossner! I will return to
Dolworm right away to report this to King
Woolard!

309241.「さあ これから 忙しくなりますよっ！\n よろしくお願いしますね <pc>隊長:
Looks like things are going to get busy from
here! Let's both do our best, Captain
<pc>!

309242.こうして ガートラント王国が中心となり\nアストルティア全体を巻きこむ\n一大プ:
And so, as spearheaded by the Gartlant
Kingdom, a large-scale project involving the
whole of Astoltia had gone underway.

309243.<pc>は ドゥラ院長と共に\nグロスナー王のもとで 未知の世界の調査の\n準備:
<pc> worked tirelessly with Dura to
prepare for the exploration of this new
world under King Grossner's guidance. And...

309244.「<pc>。\n そなたや ドゥラ院長の協力のおかげで\n 調査の準備は 順調に:
Thanks to you and Dura's efforts, preparations
for the exploration are progressing smoothly.

309245.「ドゥラ院長が 主導して おこなっていた\n 調査隊のメンバー選出も 完了した。:
Dura has taken the charge in selecting the
members of the exploration team. You'll
find them all to be quite exceptional.

309246.「その中のひとりは そなたが よく知る人物……\n グランゼドーラ王国の 勇者姫:
And one of them is someone you know well...
Gran Zedora's own Princess Anlucia.

309247.「実力 人柄ともに 調査隊の一員として\n これほどまでに ふさわしい者は\n:
I can think of no one more qualified to be a
member of this team, both in terms of
ability and character.

309248.「しかし……我が国を訪れるという\n 約束の期日は とうに過ぎておるのに\n い:
However...despite the promised deadline for
coming here has long passed, she still has
yet to show herself here.

309249.「あの勇者姫が 約束を違えるとは 信じがたい。\n もしかすると グランゼドーラ:
It's hard for me to believe that she would
do that on purpose. Perhaps something has
gone wrong over in Gran Zedora.

309250.「すまぬが グランゼドーラ城まで\n アンルシア姫を 迎えにいってほしい。\n:
I hate to ask, but I'll need you to go and
get her from Gran Zedora Castle for me.
I'm counting on you.

309252.「なるほど グロスナー王の使いで 来たのだな。\n 王には 本当に 申し訳ないこ:
I see you've come on King Grossner's behalf.
I sincerely apologize for that. This was an
emergency we were not prepared for.

309253.「調査隊への参加を 承諾する連絡をしてすぐ\n 突然 倒れてな。\n それ以来:
She collapsed just after she contacted him to
agree to join the exploration team. She's
been in a deep sleep since...

309254.「安心しろ アンルシアは眠っているだけだ。\n 身体に 異常はない。:
Rest assured, she is only sleeping. Nothing
ails her body.

309255.「いろいろと 手を尽くしたのだが\n いっこうに 目を覚まさん。\n まるで 何:
I've tried everything I can think of, but she
just won't wake up. It's as if she is
resisting something.

309256.「ただの呪いや 病気のたぐいとは思えぬ\n 異常事態だが こんな時 頼りになるは:
This is no mere curse or illnessーthis is an
abnormal situation. Normally, we could rely
on Shion for his help, but he's disappeared.

309257.「このグランゼドーラに\n いったい 何が起こっているのか……。: Just what is going on here in Gran Zedora...?

309258.「アンルシアの 眠りを解く方法は\n 私のほうで 探しておく。\n 何かわかった:
I'll find some way to break Anlucia out of her
sleep. Once I do, I'll let you know.

309259.「すまないが アンルシアは\n 今回の旅に 同行はできない。\n グロスナー王に:
I apologize that Anlucia cannot accompany you
on your journey. Please give my regards to
King Grossner.

309260.「おかえりなさい 隊長。\n おや？ アンルシア姫を\n 迎えにいったはずでは…:
Welcome back. Huh? Didn't you go to pick up
Princess Anlucia...?

309261.「アンルシア姫は おいでにならないと……。\n ずっと 眠ったまま 目を覚まさな:
Princess Anlucia must come... It's worrying
that she's stuck in a state of sleep, unable
to awaken...

309262.「おっと そうだ。たった今\n 他の調査隊のメンバーが そろったところです。\n:
Oh, right. The other members of the
exploration team just arrived. Say hello
to your captain, everyone!

309263.「よっ ひさしぶり。\n 実入りの良さそうな 仕事だったんでな。\n 調査隊とや:
Hey, long time no see. This seemed like a
pretty promising gig, so count me in to tag
along.

309264.「……ジーガンフだ。\n マリーンの事件のときは 世話になった。:
...I'm Jiganf.
I owe you one for helping out during that
whole Malynn incident.

309265.「ジーガンフは オーガの猛者たちが住む\n ランガーオ村の 武闘大会チャンピオン:
Jiganf is the champion of Langao's martial
arts tournament, home to the fiercest
Ogre fighters. I can vouch for his ability.

309266.「へへっ 俺は かわいい甥っ子……\n ラグアスに頼まれて 参加したってわけさ。:
Nyeh heh...that little squirt of a nephew of
mine asked me to join. Raguas wanted me to
go to this faraway place on his behalf.

309267.「おっと こう見えて 俺はウデも立つし\n 見知らぬ土地に行くのに サーカスの芸:
Ya see, disregarding appearances, I got skills. You'd be surprised how handy circus tricks are when you're headed to unfamiliar
places. Count on me to impress!

309268.「おひさしぶりです <pc>さん。\n また 共に 冒険できるなんて 夢のようで:
It's been so long, <pc>.
It's like a dream come to true to go on
another adventure beside you.

309269.「やあ 大魔お……おっと ここでは \n 隊長と呼んだほうが 良さそうかな。\n:
Hey, Great Dem...oops. I suppose I should
call you captain here, right? And...never
mind about my appearance.

309270.「個人的に アストルティアの近況を調べていたら\n 君が隊長となって 冒険の旅に:
I was personally investigating Astoltia's current situation when I heard you were setting off on a journey as a captain.
There's no way I could just stand by and let that pass, so here I am!

309271.「……お披露目式では <pc>の言うことを\n 信じてあげられなくて ごめんなさ:
...I'm sorry for not believing you at the
ceremony and for being so rude...

309272.「パドレ叔父様も 同じ気持ちよ。\n 私の想いを伝えたら 私が不在の間\n 国を:
Uncle Padre feels the same way. I told him
how I felt, and he promised to take care of
things while I was away.

309273.「私は あなたの言うことを 信じるわ。\n マローネさんを 捜すのに\n 私も:
I believe your words, and I want to come along
with you on your search for Marone!

309274.「以上が 異世界探索の調査隊メンバーです。\n アンルシア姫がいないのは 残念で:
And that does it for the members of our otherworld research exploration team. Although unfortunate Anlucia cannot join
us, we'll proceed forward.

309275.「お話中のところ 失礼いたします！\n 調査隊の 入隊希望者という者が\n 来て:
Excuse me for the interruption!
There's someone here who'd like to join
the exploration team...

309276.「入隊希望者？\n 募集は とうに締め切ったはずでしょう。:
Join the exploration team...? The recruitment
process has already closed.

309277.「……ええええええ～！？\n 締め切りなんて 聞いてないよう！\n ねえねえ な:
Whaaaaaaaaat?! I didn't hear anything about
a deadline! Hey, you can make an exception,
right?

309278.「なんとかと言われても 決まりですので……。\n 調査隊のメンバーは もう定員で:
Sorry, but everything's already been
decided... The exploration team is already
full. I apologize, but you'll have to leave.

309279.「そんなぁ どうしよう……。\n お師匠様に 怒られちゃうよ……。\n あっ！:
No waaay... What should I do...?
My master will be so angry with me...
Oh!

309280.「ねぇねぇ！\n もしかして キミ……<pc>？\n わぁ お師匠様の言ってた通:
You there! Aren't you... <pc>?
Wow! Just as my master said!

309281.「はじめまして！ あたし ポルテ！\n 調査隊に入って <pc>を 助けるように:
It's nice to meet you! I'm Porte!
My master told me to join the exploration
team to help you, <pc>.

309282.「……んん？ どうしたの～？\n あたしのこと じーっと見て。\n あたしの顔に:
...huh? What's the matter?
You're staring right at me... Is there
something on my face?
<select_nc>
Didn't we meet at the unveiling ceremony...?
Do you have a twin sister?
<select_end>
<case 1>
<close>
<case 2>
<close>
<case_cancel>
<close>
<case_end>

309283.「お披露目式？ なんのこと～？\n キミとは はじめましてだよ。:
Unveiling ceremony? What's that about?
This is the first time we've met.

309284.「双子？ なんのこと～？\n あたしは ひとりっ子だよ。:
Twin sister? What's that about?
I'm an only child, you know.

309285.「……おい 嬢ちゃん。オレたちが向かうのは\n 未知の生物が住む 危険な異世界だ:
Listen, little girl... We're headed for a dangerous and alien world filled with unknown creatures. You'd just slow us
down if you came along.

309286.「むぅ～ バカにしないでよっ！\n お師匠様ほどじゃないけど あたし 特別な術が:
Rrrgh! Don't underestimate me! I might not
be as good as my master, but I have a special
skill that's sure to come in handy!

309287.「いっくよ～ 見ててね～。\n むむむむぅ～～……。:
Here I go! Watch closely...
Hnnnnng....

309289.「すごい！ お花が 咲いたわ！: Amazing! It bloomed into a flower!

309290.「植物に 生命力を与え 成長させたのか。\n ヴェリナード王家の歌に 通じる……:
Do you fill plants with life to make them grow? It seems similar to the songs of the Verinard royal family... Well, no, it's
intriguing, but different.

309291.「ねっ ねっ！ すごいでしょっ？\n だから あたしを 調査隊に……:
Well? Well?! Isn't it just amazing?
That's why you gotta let me join...

309292.「でも 植物を成長させるだけでしょう？\n たしかに めずらしい技術ではあります:
But its just to make plants grow, right? It is
true that it's an unusual technique, but...

309293.「<pc> お願い！ あたし どーしても\n いっしょに 行かなくちゃいけないの:
Please, <pc>! I haaaave to go with
you, no matter what! Please let me join
the exploration team!<yesno><close>

309294.「そんなぁ！ あたし ぜーったい\n <pc>の役に 立ってみせるから！\n だ:
Don't say that! I sweeeeear I'll be
useful to you! So, please! Please let me
join the exploration team!<yesno><close>

309295.「わぁっ！ やったやった！ ありがと～！\n あたし 精一杯 がんばるからっ。\:
Yeah! Hooray, hooray! Thank you so much!
I'll do my best for you, <pc>!

309296.「まぁ 隊長が そう言うなら……。\n 何かの役に 立つかもしれませんし\n あ:
Well, if the captain says so... You may be
of some use to us, so I'll allow you to join.

309297.「さて これで 調査隊がそろいました。\n バカンウグレ遺跡の転送装置を使い\n:
Now that the team has assembled, let's all
head over to the Bakanugure Ruins and use
the teleporter to travel to the other world.

309298.「いよいよ 出発か……。\n かーっ なんだか 緊張しちまうなぁ！:
Finally, we're leaving...
Wheeeew! I'm feelin' a bit nervous here!

309299.「この遺跡は 古代オルセコの\n 時代のものだそうだよ。並べられてる像には\n:
These ruins are said to come from the ancient
Orseco period. These statues seem to have
some kind of religious significance...

309300.「……おい アンタら。\n 遠足じゃねえんだぞ。\n あんま はしゃいでんじゃね:
Hey, you guys... This is no field trip.
Don't get too excited, all right?

309301.「こちらで出発前の 最終確認をしておりますので\n みなさん もう少々 お待ちく:
We're making some final checks before we head
off, so please just give us a bit longer!

309302.「あなたのお母さん……\n 見つかるといいわね <pc>！:
About your mom...
I hope that we'll find her!

309304.「消え……ちゃった。今の見たよね？\n お師匠様の言ってた通りだ。\n これが:
They're...gone. You saw it, right?
It's just as my master said. This is
unmaking...

309305.「……気づいているのは あたしたちだけ。\n みんな 像があったことすら\n 覚:
We're the only ones who noticed... I don't
think they even remember that the statues
were there.

309306.「創失は アストルティアに 降りかかった呪い。\n 創生のチカラを 奪われちゃう:
Unmaking is a curse that's afflicted Astoltia.
It's taken away the power of creation.

309307.「創失の呪いは すべての存在を食いつぶす。\n このままいくと アストルティア\:
The curse of unmaking eats away at any and
all existence. If this keeps up, then Astoltia
itself will disappear...

309308.「アンルシア姫が 眠ってしまったのも\n 創失に 関係があるのかも……。:
Maybe unmaking has something to do with
Anlucia falling asleep...

309309.「お師匠様が 言ってた。\n これから向かう 未知の世界には\n 創失の呪いを解:
My master said that there is a clue on how to
break the curse of unmaking in this unknown
world.

309310.「アストルティアを\n 救えるのは あたしたちだけ。\n なんとしても その手が:
We're the only ones who can save Astoltia.
We have to find that clue, no matter what
it takes!

309311.「お待たせしました！\n 準備が完了しましたので みなさん\n 装置のそばに 集:
Thank you for your patience! Now that
everything is ready, please gather around the
device!

309312.「行こう <pc>！\n キミのお母さんを 助けるためにも！:
Come on, <pc>!
Let's go save your mother!

309313.「それでは これより\n 探索拠点の設営を 開始します！:
We will now begin setting up our base of
operations!

309315.「みなさん ご協力 ありがとうございます！\n 調査拠点……では少々 味気ないで:
Thank you everyone for your cooperation!
Base of operations...it's a bit bland, don't
you think?

309316.「この拠点を 私たちの冒険の始まる場所……\n はじまりの地と 名付けたいと思い:
This place where our adventure begins... I
hereby dub this base as the Land of
Beginnings!

309317.「それでは これからの調査計画について\n お話しさせていただきましょう。:
I'll now brief you on the plans for our
upcoming exploration efforts.

309318.「拠点設営の際 撤去した結晶がふさいでいた先を\n 見回ったところ このはじまり:
We looked around the area that was previously
blocked off from the crystals, and we found
that this base is surrounded by large plains.

309319.「さらに この平野から 東西南北へ\n 続く道が 発見されたのです。:
Furthermore, we discovered paths leading
east, west, north, and south from these
plains.

309320.「皆さんには 二人一組で チームを組み\n 平野の先の調査へ \n それぞれ 向:
I'd like each of you to form teams of two, and
explore what lies beyond each of these
directions.

309321.「僭越ながら バランスを考え\n 事前に 私のほうで チーム割りを\n させてい:
Allow me to take the liberty of assigning your
team assignments for the sake of balancing
purposes.

309322.「まず……メレアーデ王女と ジーガンフ殿。\n おふたりには 南の地の 調査をお:
First off... I'd like Miss Mereade and Jiganf
to explore the area to the south.

309323.「ふふっ 了解しましたっ。\n よろしくね ジーガンフさん！:
Hehe! Roger that!
Let's do our best, Jiganf!

309324.「ヒューザ殿と アスバル殿は\n 北を お願いします。:
Hyuza and Asbal, I'd like you to go to the
north.

309325.「ナブレット殿と エステラ殿には\n 東に 向かっていただきましょう。:
Nablette and Estella, I'd like you two to
head for the east.

309326.「そして……残る西の地は\n <pc>隊長と ポルテ殿\n ふたりに 行っていた:
And finally...the remaining west side I'll
leave to <pc> and Porte.

309327.「わーい！\n キミと いっしょに行けるなんて うれしい！\n よろしくね 隊長:
Yaaay! I'm happy I'm able to go along with
you! Come on, captain!

309328.「各地で 何が待ち受けているか\n わかりません。充分な備えをしてから\n 調査:
There's no telling what lies in each
direction. Make sure to adequately prepare
before you head out.

309329.「それでは最後に……<pc>隊長。\n 調査に向かう隊員たちに ひと言\n 激励:
One last thing... <pc>, please give
some words of encouragement to our
members here before they head out.

309330.隊員たちに 何と言いますか？\n<select_nc>\nガンガンいこうぜ\nい:
What will you say?
<select_nc>
Let's go all out!
Let's mix it up!
Let's focus safety!
<select_end>
<case 1>
<close>
<case 2>
<close>
<case 3>
<close>
<case_cancel>
<close>
<case_end>

309331.「ああ 新種の魔物が 現れようが\n 全部 オレが ぶった斬ってやる。\n 大船:
Yeah... Even if new monsters show up, I'll
just slash 'em all down. Just leave it to me.
It'll be smooth sailing.

309332.「うん。様々な側面から\n 物事を見ることは 大切だ。\n この調査を 実のある:
Yeah, it's important to look at things from
various perspectives. Let's make this
exploration count.

309333.「ええ 安全第一で参りましょう。\n 皆さんの無事が 最優先です。:
Yes, it's wise to be safe. Everyone's safety
is our top priority.

309334.「私は ここに残り みなさんからの\n 調査報告を お待ちしております。\n く:
I'll stay here and wait for everyone's report.
Stay safe out there!

309335.調査隊の隊員たちは\nそれぞれ 調査に向かった。\nポルテと共に 平野の西へ向か:
Each member of the exploration team headed
out in their respective direction. Head west
across the plains with Porte.

309337.「うーん……。\n 何か 封印がされているみたい。\n このままじゃ 先に進めな:
Hmmm... It looks like it's sealed up or
something. How are we gonna get past this...?

309340.「わたくしは 女神ゼネシア……。\n この世界 果ての大地ゼニアスを\n 守護す:
I am the goddess Zenethia...
I protect this world of Zeniath...

309341.「あなたがたは……\n ゼニアスの住人では ありませんね？:
You... You are not denizens of this world,
are you?

309342.「えっと……はじめまして 女神さま！\n あたしは ポルテ。こっちは\n 燈火の:
Umm...nice to meet you, miss goddess!
I'm Porte, and this is <pc>.
Captain of the Ember Explorers!

309343.「あたしたち アストルティアという世界から\n ジア・クト念晶体っていうヤツらが:
We came to this world from Astoltia, using a
device that was left behind by a group
called the Dia Kut Telecrystal.

309344.「アストルティアは 今\n 創失の呪いに むしばまれていて……\n それを 解く:
And Astoltia is now under the curse of
unmaking...so we're looking for a way to
break it.

309345.「それで あたしたち\n この扉の先に 進みたくて……。\n そのぉ……なんとか:
So, we were hoping we could go past this
door... Is...isn't there anything you can
do?

309346.「扉の先は いわば禁足地……。\n この世界の秘密が 眠る場所……。:
Beyond that door lies a forbidden land, so to
speak... It is where the secrets of this world
lie dormant...

309347.「あなたがたが 求めるものは\n そこで 見つけられることでしょう。:
You will find what you are searching for
there.

309348.「この世界の神として わたくしも\n あなたがたの チカラになって\n さしあげ:
As goddess of this world, I wish that I could
do more to assist you...

309349.「いにしえの戦いにより\n わたくしは チカラを封じられており\n 動くことが:
Due to an ancient battle, my power has been
sealed, and I cannot move...

309351.「ですが 方法はあります。\n この世界で 星のオーラを 探すのです。:
But there is still a way. You can search for
Benevolessence within this world.

309352.「南 北 東の地に おもむき\n そこで暮らす人々を 助けることで\n 星のオー:
By helping the people who reside to the south,
the north, and the east, you will be able to
gather Benevolessence.

309353.「この星封の結晶を\n あなたがたに 授けましょう。: I will bestow upon you this Benevogem.

309355.「星封の結晶に 星のオーラを満たすのです。\n さすれば 道は ひらけるでしょう:
Fill the Benevogem with Benevolessence.
Only then will the way forward open.

309356.「また その結晶があれば\n この世界の様々な場所を 自由に\n 行き来すること:
With that gem, you will be able to travel
freely between this world's many locales.

309357.「あなたがたの旅に お役立てなさい。:
I hope it will be of use to you in your
journey.

309359.「星々の加護の あらんことを……。: May the blessing of the stars be with you...

309360.「すっごく キレイな人だったねぇ。\n 女神さまと話すのなんて 初めてだから\n:
She was so pretty, don't you think? That's the
first time I ever had to talk to a goddess.
Talk about nerve wracking!

309361.「星のオーラって いったい なんなんだろう？\n ゼネシアさまは この世界の人を:
Just what IS Benevolessence, anyway? Zenethia
said we can collect it if we help the people
of this world...

309362.「うーん……よくわかんないから\n とりあえず はじまりの地に戻って\n 今の話:
Hmmm... I have no clue. I think we should
head back to the Land of Beginnings and
report to Dura what we just witnessed.

309364.メインコマンドの 『どうぐ』の中にある\n『星封の結晶』を使うと アストルティア:
The "Benevogem" in your "Items" will allow you
to travel back and forth between Astoltia
and Zeniath.

309365.さらに ゼニアスで訪れた場所が 登録されるほか\n各地にある『星のくさび』を し:
Furthermore, locations that you visit within
Zeniath can be registered as destinations
by searching for "Star Stops".

309366.ゼニアスでは 屋根のある場所でも 使えます。\nまた『元の世界へ戻る』を選ぶと:
In Zeniath, you can use the Benevogem in places with roofs. You can also choose "Return to Astoltia" to go back to a place
quite familiar to you.

309367.なお 星封の結晶の追加により\n『魂の燭台』は ルーラストーンの\nメニュー内に:
With the addition of the Benevogem, the
Soul Candelabra has been moved to the
Zoomstone menu.

315620.「謎に包まれし 未知なる大地に\n 火を燈せし 我ら『燈火の調査隊』！\n いざ:
We, the "Ember Explorers", will light
the flames that will illuminate this unknown
land shrouded in mystery!

318419.<pc>は そっと 部屋を後にした……。\nガートラント城の グロスナー王に\n:
<pc> quietly leaves the room... Go
and report to King Grossner in Gartlant
Castle.

318420.「ふふっ 君と同じチームなんて 光栄だな。:
Heh heh... It's an honor to be on the same
team as you.

318421.「おうよっ 任せときな！: Oh yeah, just leave it to me!

321821.磁光石に 装置が 反応しているようだ。\n装置を よく見ると 何かを\nはめるよ:
The device seems to be reacting to the Magnetolite. Looking closer at the device, there appears to be a hollow where something
can be inserted...

321974.ルーラストーンから 勇者姫の石を使い\nアンルシアを 迎えにいこう。:
Use the Hero's Room Zoomstone to go and pick
up Anlucia.

321975.しばらくすると 燈火の調査隊の\nメンバーが到着し ドゥラ院長主導のもと\n出発:
After some time, the members of the Ember
Explorers arrived, and the preparations for
their departure were led by Dura...

321996.「創生のチカラっていうのは すべてのものに宿る\n 生命力みたいなもの。これが:
The power of creation is like a life force
that resides in all things. If it weakens,
then existence as we know it ceases to be.
